data.system_settings: Motorolla Droid Ultra XT1080 Android 4.4 KitKat
data.actual_result: The Voice Channel fails to connect, And gives me a redial button that won't work
data.expected_result: The Voice Chat should show who is in the channel
data.short_description: When trying to connect to Voice Chat, The Redial button appears and will not go away.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Voice Channel - Tap on the channel
